alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 9:51AM CDT until June 14 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM CDT FOR WESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTY... At 951 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Red Bay, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russellville, Red Bay, Belgreen, Vina, Hodges, Atwood, Duketon, Rockwood, Halltown and Dempsey. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
